name: Registry
description: Information about a registry key or value.

children.name: registry_key
children.description: Registry key associated with an application or system component (for example, HKEY_HKCU\Environment...).

children.name: registry_value_data
children.description: Data associated with a registry value (for example, %USERPROFILE%\Local Settings\Temp).

children.name: registry_value_name
children.description: Name of the registry value associated with an application or system component (for example, TEMP).
